pkgmetadata.longdescription: # eolearn.mask subpackageThe subpackage is used for masking of data and calculation of cloud masks.For more information about the module visit [readthedocs](https://eo-learn.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/eolearn.mask.html), or see the [module task index](https://eo-learn.readthedocs.io/en/latest/eotasks.html#mask).
